Texto: 
asymptomatic during sonographic evaluation.
must rule out gallbladder cancer.  elective cholecystectomy.  close follow-up if not a surgical candidate.
long and transverse gray scale and color flow images of the gallbladder demonstrate non-mobile echogenic material in the gallbladder fundus with posterior shadowing and blood flow.
adenomyomatosis
gallbladder cancer.
gallbladder polyp with calcification.
adherent stone: less likely with demonstrated blood flow.
patient has long history of biliary colic
none.
